metadata.title: CVE-2024-2829 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 12.5 before 16.9.6, all versions starting from 16.10 before16.10.4, all versions starting from 16.11 before 16.11.1. A craftedwildcard filter in FileFinder may lead to a denial of service.

criterions.comment: gitlab-agent package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
